Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED4 WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY PROYCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_ITCRED4 ( ITCRED4CODI, PROYCODI, IDCMP, BARRA, TIPO, VNKV, CAPMVAR, NPASOS, PASOACT, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :ITCRED4CODI, :PROYCODI, :IDCMP, :BARRA, :TIPO, :VNKV, :CAPMVAR, :NPASOS, :PASOACT, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_ITCRED4 SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, IDCMP = :IDCMP, BARRA = :BARRA, TIPO = :TIPO, VNKV = :VNKV, CAPMVAR = :CAPMVAR, NPASOS = :NPASOS, PASOACT = :PASOACT, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE ITCRED4CODI = :ITCRED4CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED4 ORDER BY ITCRED4CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_ITCRED4 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCRED4 WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ITCRED4CODI ASC
